name: Digital Hanging Luggage Scale with Backlit for Travel, Portable Handheld Suitcase Weight Scale with Hook, 110 Pounds, Battery Included
short_description: Avoid Overweight Fees: hook your package for instant weight and no more unexpected overweight luggage or baggage fees again.
Perfect for travel - Comes with nylon strap and durable steel hook conveneient for suitcase and packags, etc. Weight locked automatically, zero/tare function. Battery and User Manual included.

Easy to use: Use the hook and strap to wrap and lift your package, then hold it steady for 2 seconds to get an accurate weight. Units conversion between lb and kg, Maximium weight 110 LB/50 KG, Graduation: 0.1 LB/50.
Easy to read: LCD display with backlit and indications for low battery and overload, It also has auto-off function, no worrys batteries died due to forget to switch off the device.

Typical Usage Example: For instance, weigh your luggage before airport check-in, or measure product weights when shopping at supermarkets, farmers' markets, or convenience stores. Compact and portable, ready to use on the go.

Friendly Reminder 1: Just pull the strap through the handle of whatever you want to weigh, and latch the hook onto the metal triangle at the top to make a loop. Please don't try to hook the hook onto the handle. Please note that this luggage scale requires a screwdriver to remove the battery by unscrewing the battery cover (a small screwdriver is already included in our packaging).

Friendly Reminder 2: The handheld scale is characterized by its high portability and convenience for use anytime, anywhere—precisely the original intent behind its design. as it is difficult to keep the scale completely steady during weighing (unlike platform scales), the measurement accuracy of handheld luggage scales is indeed slightly lower compared to platform scales or kitchen scales. We sincerely inform all consumers of this fact. If you find this difficult to accept or are particularly concerned about this limitation, please consider carefully. Appreciate your understanding and support!
